wblut.geom

Class WB_Delaunay.DelaunayWatson

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.geom.WB_Delaunay
      • wblut.geom.WB_Delaunay.DelaunayWatson
  • Enclosing class:
    WB_Delaunay

    static class WB_Delaunay.DelaunayWatson
extends WB_Delaunay
    DelaunayWatson represents an O(N^2) method with low overhead to find the Delaunay triangulation or tetrahedralization of a set of samples of R^2 or R^3.
